content: yungalgo: Merged 4 significant PRs this week, including a major refactoring effort to centralize directory detection with monorepo support (#5011, +584/-400 lines) and a substantial fix for runtime initialization and database adapter handling (#5092, +759/-591 lines). Also made progress on 3 open PRs focused on directory type detection and project placement, with overall activity showing a pattern of concentrated work across 3 days resulting in substantial code changes (+3654/-1672 lines across 110 files).
